name: get_afni_model_PRF_6
author: AFNI Developers
description: A command to invoke AFNI's population receptive field (pRF) model

inputs.name: Time Points (NT)
inputs.description: Number of time points of the stimulus dataset.

inputs.name: X Center (x)
inputs.description: X coordinate of the pRF center.

inputs.name: Y Center (y)
inputs.description: Y coordinate of the pRF center.

inputs.name: Sigma (sigma)
inputs.description: Standard deviation of the Gaussian pRF.

inputs.name: Sigma Ratio (sigrat)
inputs.description: Ratio of standard deviations (sigma_x/sigma_y) of the Gaussian pRF.

inputs.name: Theta (theta)
inputs.description: Rotation angle theta of the Gaussian pRF.
